workflow.description: The process of creating a lesson will go through these stages.
workflow.name: Stages for Lesson Creation

stage.description: The stage for initial creation of presentation.
stage.name: CREATED

stage.description: The stage for assigning content items to a Content Creator.
stage.name: CONTENT_ASSIGNED

stage.description: The stage when the content creator starts creating content.
stage.name: DRAFT

stage.description: The stage when the content creator finishes creating content.
stage.name: COMPLETED

stage.description: The stage for Review of the created content.
stage.name: REVIEW

stage.description: The stage if the content is approved by reviewer.
stage.name: APPROVED

stage.description: The stage when the content is published.
stage.name: PUBLISHED

stage.description: The stage when the content is un-published.
stage.name: UNPUBLISHED

stage.description: The stage if the content is dis-approved by reviewer.
stage.name: DISAPPROVED

stage.description: The stage if the content is deleted.
stage.name: DELETED
